DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ${individualMatch}; CREATE TABLE ${individualMatch} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, likes BIGINT NOT NULL default 0, views BIGINT NOT NULL default 0, individual_gender VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, individual_minimum BIGINT NOT NULL, individual_maximum BIGINT NOT NULL, individual_number BIGINT NOT NULL, recruit_start DATETIME NOT NULL, recruit_end DATETIME NOT NULL, manager_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
soccer_field BIGINT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (soccer_field) REFERENCES soccer_field(id), field_reservation BIGINT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (field_reservation) REFERENCES field_reservation(id), users BIGINT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (users) REFERENCES users(id) );
